title: Feature Selection Using A Hybrid Approach: Harmony Search with Recurrent Neural Networks and Filter Methods on the Mimic-III Dataset
details: K Preethi, M Ramakrishnan - Nanotechnology Perceptions, 2024
abstract: Building reliable and effective prediction models requires careful feature selection, especially when working with complicated medical datasets. Applied to the Medical Information Mart for Intensive Care III (MIMIC-III) dataset, this study presents a novel …
